title: Urukku bhAramAi
sahitya:
Urukku bhAramAi vAzhanE nAn UzhaittunDun paNI sheyyat-tAzhEnE


anupallavi

  pAruyirt-toghudiyAip-paravi viLaiyADum paramA podu nala varamE aruLuvAi


caraNam    UnuDal pUNDuyir uLLa nAL varaiyilum ovvoru mUccaiyum sevviya sheyalAkki
mOnak-kalappai koNDu jnAna uzhavu sheidE muttip-payir viLaikkum shakti enakkaruLvAi
ulagellAm nalam pera UTTi varumai OTTip-palanaiyuDan malaraDi bhaktiyAi vaittiDuvEn
